channel.title: Jaguar on un01s code
channel.description: Recent content in Jaguar on un01s code

item.title: Use Jaguar to update toit code over WiFi
item.description: The Jaguar tool is great. Use an Airport to setup a WiFi network. Then download the binary of Jaguar. Run the following commands one after another. The second command requires the WiFi credentials. Use CTRL+C to stop the third one. To run the forth and the fifth command, put your computer on the same WiFi network as the esp32 device. $./jag setup $./jag flash $./jag monitor $./jag scan $./jag run hello.
